Package util

Class ImportUtils

java.lang.Object
util.ImportUtils
public class ImportUtils extends Object
Utility class for managing the import process, handling API configurations and utilities.

      public ImportUtils()

  • Method Details

    • generateXappToken

      public static String generateXappToken() throws ArtsyException
      Generates an XAPP token for Artsy API authentication.
      Returns:
      The generated XAPP token.
      Throws:
      ArtsyException - If an error occurs during token generation.

    • calculateWaitTime

      public static int calculateWaitTime(int attempt)
      Calculates the wait time for API request retries. Implements an exponential backoff strategy for waiting between retries.
      Parameters:
      attempt - The current attempt number.
      Returns:
      The calculated wait time in milliseconds.

    • getNextApiUrl

      public static String getNextApiUrl(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonObject)
      Retrieves the next API URL from a JSON response for pagination purposes.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The JSON object containing the API response.
      Returns:
      The next API URL, or an empty string if not available.

    • cleanString

      public static String cleanString(String original)
      Cleans and standardizes a string by escaping certain characters.
      Parameters:
      original - The original string to be cleaned.
      Returns:
      The cleaned string.
